name: Pet Savers
description:
Play Match-3 to build your farm and rescue kidnapped puppies, kittens and other pets!
Unveil the story of brave Foxie saving his friends, solve puzzles & rebuild their worlds!

• Save adorable puppies, kittens and other pets!
• 500+ challenging and fun levels!
• 10 amazing worlds to be discovered and rebuilt!
• Match fruits to make powerful drones & boosters!
• Easy to learn, but challenging to master!

Whatever you are doing, pick up and play now!

BECOME A FAN: https://www.facebook.com/petsaversgame
FOLLOW US: @Plexonic

P.S. The game is powered by SALTR!
